price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߎ߬ ߢߍߞߏ ߣߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߐߞߏ ߟߐ߲߫ ، ߞߏ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߲߬ߕߐ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ مَا بَيۡنَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَمَا خَلۡفَهُمۡۚ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُرۡجَعُ ٱلۡأُمُورُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu mā bayna aydīhim wamā khalfahum wa-ilā al-lahi tur'jaʿu al-umūru
